Configuration.Name: ALMA_NCIP_Lending_Client
Configuration.Author: Bill Jones, SUNY Geneseo; Kurt Munson, Northwestern University Libraries (Modified by Matt Niehoff)
Configuration.Description: This system level addon allows for ILLiad to communicate with Alma via NCIP to update lending requests in Alma.

Setting.name: NCIP_Responder_URL
Setting.Description: Replace "xxx" with your institution's three letter Alma code. If SUNY, replace "xxx" with "suny-zzz", and replace zzz with your institution's three letter Alma code.

Setting.name: acceptItem_from_uniqueAgency_value
Setting.Description: Replace "XXX" with your institution's three letter Alma code. If SUNY, replace "XXX" with "SUNY_ZZZ", and replace ZZZ with your institution's three letter Alma code.

Setting.name: ApplicationProfileType
Setting.Description: Input the Resource Sharing Partner code used in Alma.

Setting.name: LendingCheckOutItemFailQueue
Setting.Description: This designates the name of the queue a Lending Transaction will be moved to if the CheckOutItem function fails.

Setting.name: LendingCheckInItemFailQueue
Setting.Description: This designates the name of the queue a Lending Transaction will be moved to if the CheckInItem function fails.
